items.headline: guided <strong>Virtual Agent<strong/>
items.text: Nandini is a virtual agent that guides you through six sections of questions

items.headline: Adaptive and natural <strong>Dialogue<strong/>
items.text: Throughout the process, nandini provides multiple choice answer

items.headline: Low vision <strong>Accesibility<strong/>
items.text: The entire solution is keyboard navigatable and WCAG 2.0 AA compliant
